metadata.description: How well you work together on shared projects and tasks

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Mars shows action style and initiative. Venus shows cooperation and harmony. Mercury shows coordination.

planet_meanings.Mars: action style, initiative, and how you tackle tasks
planet_meanings.Venus: cooperation, compromise, and working in harmony

very_low.label: Clash
very_low.guidance: Teamwork very hard; clear roles and minimal shared projects.

low.label: Clunky
low.guidance: Can collaborate but feels awkward; extra structure needed.

high.label: Smooth
high.guidance: Team up well; good for shared tasks.

very_high.label: Dream Team
very_high.guidance: Very strong synergy; big project potential.
